title: Person of Interest - Carter Joins The Team
author: CBS
comment: I LIKE THIS SHOW HOPE THERE IS SEASON 3
This show went off the air too soon.
Started off as science fiction, and ended up a reality show👀
It has been renewed for a third season, along with NCIS LA, and Blue Bloods.
description: Go behind the scenes as Detective Carter finally gets a peek at what Reese & Finch do, on PERSON OF INTEREST, Thursday, Jan. 12 (9:00-10:00, ET/PT) on the CBS Television Network.
